t: When*pn the Lord*s restored the fortunes of Zion, we*ld were like those who dreamed.
Our*ln mouths were filled with laughter, our*ld tongues with songs of joy. Then*ln it was said among the nations, “The*ld Lord*s has done great things for them.”
The*ln Lord*s has done great things for us, and*ld we are filled with joy.
Restore*pn our fortunes, Lord,*s like*ld streams in the Negev.
Those*ln who sow with tears will*ld reap with songs of joy.
Those*ln who go out weeping, carrying*ld seed to sow, will*ln return with songs of joy, carrying*ld sheaves with them.
